desc.text:
Snapshot of the site on 2016-03-01. Sources for FindA.Photo:
Jay Mantri / @JayMantri
Life Of Pix
MMT / @mmtstock
Picography / @picography
Skitterphoto / @Skitterphoto
and Unsplash / @unsplash.
Snapshot on 2016-03-21. Images larger than 500KB. JPEGs included only if compressed at more than 10bits per pixel.
Random sample of 1080p frames from Elephant's Dream by Orange Open Movie Project studio.
Random sample of 1080p frames from Big Buck Bunny by Blender Foundation.

KODAK Photo CD containing 24 photographic quality images of a variety of subjects in many locations, and under a variety of lighting conditions.  Thumbnail size replicas of these images are printed on the cover of the Photo CD case.  Some of the images were created by Kodak's professional photographers; others were selected from the winners of the Kodak International Newspaper Snapshot Awards (KINSA), an annual amateur photo competition sponsored by Kodak and participating newspapers in several countries.
v4 by Nicola Asuni. We only include a subset: photographic images at 300px and 1200px, and a small subset of test patterns.
